segments.text: Hello , Miss , what can I do for you this afternoon ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I need the haircut . But you seem so busy today .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , it is , busy today . We usually have a lot more clients on the weekend . Would you like to take a sit , and wait for a while , please ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Ok , but how long I have to wait , it is going to be more than 30 minutes .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It should be around that , if you like , please for a free to read the magazine while you are wait .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sorry to keep you waiting , Miss . I'll have a dresser Mr.Li is just finish with a client in a moment or two . Would you have a shampoo first ? I'll get it on for you .
segments.speaker: S1
